sourceDesc.p: Transcription reprinted by Ian St George in eColenso May 2015 Supplement, available at http://www.colensostudy.id.au/Newsletters/eCol%205%20May15%20supplement.pdf
encoded into TEI by Jamie Norrish, 17.11.15

body.p: I half looked for you yesterday—but failed in finding you.—I enclose you a memo of account for fencing (which I think I gave you when last here)—the whip you had in leaving—& the Maori Test. I sent to Mr Barclay as you desired.—Can’t you come up and spend the evening with me?—Or tomorrow eve?—Or any evening this week—
